Texto: 
chest: short flared ribs spine: there is decreased interpediculate distance from l3-5, flat vertebrae with inferior beaking, l1-2 gibbus deformity, sacroiliac notching with squaring of the iliac wings.  extremities:  there is rhizomelic shortening with flaring of the metaphyses, shortening of the hands bones with similar length of 2nd-4th digits consistent with trident hand.
achondroplasia
heterozygous achondroplasia
hypochondroplasia
homozygous achondroplasia
thanatophoric dysplasia
2 week old being evaluated in genetics clinic.
the patient had classic findings consistent with the diagnosis.
